title: Ethnicities in Iran
summary: The majority of the population of Iran (approximately 67â€“80%) consists of Iranic peoples.[2][3][4][5] The largest groups in this category include Persians (who form the majority of the Iranian population) and Kurds, with smaller communities including Gilakis, Mazandaranis, Lurs, Tats, Talysh, and Baloch.
